revised_title: Discovery of the Pelorosaurus: A Gigantic Terrestrial Reptile
tldr: In this article, Gideon Algernon Mantell describes the discovery of a new gigantic terrestrial reptile, the Pelorosaurus, whose remains were found alongside those of the Iguanodon and other Saurians in the Tilgate Forest strata. The author discusses the characteristics and size of the Pelorosaurus, as well as the geological and environmental conditions of the ancient world where these creatures lived.
